A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it. The story is truly about Kylo Ren and Rey. So excited to see where this goes. I loved how this movie got in to the force and was the most cerebral of all the Star Wars. Polarizing because some are not going to like that there are traditional Star Wars rules that are broken. But that's what I loved about it. It was bold\, new\, and fresh.
